hotels.title: Historic Downtown Portland Escape near Fashionable Pearl District
hotels.description: Treat yourself to an indulgent stay in one of Portland's finest designer hotels, the Royal Sonesta Portland Downtown. An urban sanctuary positioned in the heart of Downtown, just a stone's throw away from the fashionable Pearl District, this is the perfect launchpad for exploring the city, with the very best of Portland on your doorstep - including winding shopping streets, hippie haunts, upmarket eateries and an abundance of natural beauty. One of the city's first boutique hotels, it's safe to say this historic architectural marvel is anything but ordinary. Housed in what was once the distinguished Lipman Wolfe Department Store, the Royal Sonesta Portland Downtown offers the quintessential Portland experience with its old-fashioned charm and a new-world personality. Share stories over a tipple in the show-stopping lounge, indulge in a menu inspired by Oregon farm-to-table produce at Finch on 5th, be swept away with a relaxing afternoon at Dosha 5th Avenue Spa, enjoy a ride on a Peloton Bike in the fitness centre, or simply unwind in the hotel's thoughtfully appointed guest rooms, featuring bespoke bird wallpaper, custom hardwood furnishings and playful décor.

hotels.title: Riverside Boutique Portland Stay near City Centre with Seafood Restaurant, Bar & Gym
hotels.description: Wander the idyllic banks of Portland’s Willamette River and discover charming cottages and stunning suites home to Kimpton RiverPlace Hotel, an IHG Hotel. Just minutes from the city’s centre, feel a million miles away as you sip on your local morning brew overlooking the expansive flowing river just outside the quaint weatherboard building. After long days exploring this vibrant metropolis, unwind at the hotel’s fully-equipped gy or at modern riverside venue King Tide Fish & Shell.
